meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a refreshing cuke in my salad.

meanings.definition: To make a sharp, sudden turn
meanings.sent1: The car had to cuke to avoid hitting the animal on the road.
meanings.sent2: The skater had to cuke to avoid crashing into the wall.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel decided to cuke at the last moment, surprising the cat.
meanings.sent4: Her heart seemed to cuke when she saw the unexpected sight.
meanings.sent5: The plot of the story took a sudden cuke, leaving the readers intrigued.
